title: Fix message sender display and enhance admin/daily question features

requirements.text: Display 'Takshi' and 'Aashi' as sender names in chat messages instead of 'unknown'. When a message has no senderId or the senderId cannot be resolved to a profile, display the appropriate name based on the sender's identity (Takshi or Aashi).

quotes: make sure not if instead of unknow when i send the message it should show takshi and aashi

acceptanceCriteria: Chat messages display 'Takshi' or 'Aashi' as sender names
No messages show 'unknown' as the sender name
Sender name correctly reflects the user's identity selection

requirements.text: Apply the 'Takshi' and 'Aashi' sender name display logic consistently across all apps in the project (ChatPage, DailyCheckInPage, ReactionsPage, and any other pages that display user-generated content).

quotes: this should be the case in all the apps

acceptanceCriteria: All pages that display user content show 'Takshi' or 'Aashi' names
Consistent naming behavior across the entire application
No instances of 'unknown' or unresolved sender names anywhere

requirements.text: Restrict admin panel access exclusively to the user 'takshi'. Only Takshi should be able to access the admin panel page and see the admin panel navigation option.

quotes: only takshi should have access to the admin pannel

acceptanceCriteria: Admin panel is only accessible when localStorage identity is 'takshi'
Admin panel navigation card only appears for Takshi
Aashi cannot access or see the admin panel

requirements.text: Implement automatic daily question generation or scheduling to ensure a new question appears every day. The system should either automatically create new questions or ensure that scheduled questions appear daily without manual intervention.
acceptanceCriteria: A new daily check-in question appears automatically each day
Users see a fresh question every 24 hours
The system handles question rotation without requiring manual admin updates

constraints: Do not change the backend message schema or migration logic
Maintain the existing localStorage-based identity system for 'takshi' and 'aashi'
Preserve the current admin panel functionality while restricting access
nonGoals: Changing the authentication or Internet Identity system
Modifying the backend authorization checks beyond what's needed for daily questions
Redesigning the user interface or navigation structure
